title: CLOPS
description: The CLOPS benchmark schema definition, describing parameters for the CLOPS benchmark.

benchmark_name.description: Name of the benchmark. Must be 'CLOPS' for this schema.

num_qubits.description: Number of qubits (width) in the circuits.

num_layers.description: Number of repeated layers or blocks in the circuit.

num_circuits.description: Number of circuits to generate and run for this benchmark.

shots.description: Number of measurement shots (repetitions) per circuit.

two_qubit_gate.description: Two-qubit gate to use. This should be a native entangling gate supported by the device.
